### Internal Scores

[Expected Value of SGP](data/shinyACED/aced_sgp.csv)  This is the overall Bayes net score running from -1 to 1

### Groups (for DIF studies)

[Classroom](data/shinyACED/classroom.csv)  Which classroom was the student from.

[Condition](data/shinyACED/condition.csv)  Study Condition

[Race](data/shinyACED/race.csv)  Coding is not available.

[Academic Level](data/shinyACED/track.csv)  Academic level of classroom.

Redone to be in Shiny's prefered 0,1 format

[Gender](data/shinyACED/gender.csv)

[Feedback](data/shinyACED/feedback.csv) Full feedback 1 versus accuracy only 1

[Sequencing](data/shinyACED/sequencing.csv) Adaptive 1 versus linear 0

[Race Focal Group 2](data/shinyACED/racef2.csv) Group 2 versus 7

[Race Focal Group 3](data/shinyACED/racef3.csv) Group 3 versus 7

[Race Focal Group 6](data/shinyACED/racef6.csv) Group 6 versus 7

[ELL](data/shinyACED/ell.csv) English language learners versus regular ed.

[Special Ed](data/shinyACED/specialed.csv) Special versus regular ed.
